TITLE.P: Framework Agreements for Services for UPS Systems

SHORT_DESCR.P: This framework agreement is for the Norwegian Defence Estate Agency's need for uninterrupted electricity supply (UPS systems).
The purpose of the framework agreement is to cover The Norwegian Defence Estates Agency's need for:

— operation and maintenance services that ensure uninterrupted electricity supply (UPS system) with associated batteries, electrical distribution boards, ventilation and cooling installations that satisfy the operative requirements that are set for such equipment,
— replacement of components on the existing uninterrupted electricity supply (UPS system) with associated cooling installation,

— services connected to battery installations. The need is mainly for service, maintenance and repairs to uninterrupted electricity supply. The framework agreements have interface with already established framework agreements for service on climate installations, electrotechnical installations and back-up power aggregates.

The contract owner of the framework agreement concept will be the Norwegian Defence Estates Agency's Property administration agency. Administration of the contract will be through the procurements department.

All departments included in the Norwegian Defence Estate Agency's organisation can use the agreement within given geographical areas, when authority is given. The framework agreement can also be used by the entire Norwegian armed forces, i.e. all departments that are included in or under the Royal Ministry of Defence, and which manage and operate their own buildings in the stated geographical areas.

Some installations in some locations are exempt from this notice and have separate maintenance contracts. Such installations are not included in this notice. Installations at Reitan near Bodø are, for example, not included in the contract.

Travel costs to each individual object will be covered in accordance with the government's domestic travel regulations. Freight and other necessary costs will be covered in accordance with a documented invoice.
The procurement is split into 2 contest areas and covers nationwide services for Galaxy UPS and other manufactured UPS' respectively, see the tender documentation Part I), invitation.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The framework agreement will be valid for 2 (two) calendar years after the contract is signed, with an option for an extension for up to (1) one year plus (1) one year, maximum 4 (four) calendar years.

INFO_ADD.P: The procurement is split into 2 contest areas and covers nationwide services for Galaxy UPS and other manufactured UPS. The framework agreement can also be used by the entire Norwegian Armed Forces, i.e. all departments that are included in or under the Royal Ministry of Defence, and which manage.
